title: Footer Contact Us navigates to /telegram with route transition UX

requirements.summary: Wire the footer “Contact Us” action to navigate to the existing /telegram route using useRouteTransition().startTransition so the global spinner + fade-in transition remains consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: In the site footer, clicking the “Contact Us” button navigates to `/telegram` (URL changes and the Telegram page renders).
The navigation uses the existing route-transition behavior (spinner overlay appears briefly, then destination page fades in).
The existing footer links (“Terms & Conditions”, “Privacy Policy”) continue to work as-is and are not broken by the change.

file_operations.description: Add a Contact Us click handler that calls useRouteTransition().startTransition('/telegram') and wire it to the existing “Contact Us” button; keep Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy handlers unchanged.
